description:
35 Ability Power
200 Health
20 Ability Haste
125% Base Mana Regen

Soul Siphon
Damaging a champion grants a Soul Shard, up to 2.
Healing or Shielding an ally consumes all Soul Shards to restore Health and deal magic damage to the nearest enemy champion per Shard.
name: Echoes of Helia
plaintext: Damage low-health enemies to trigger a cursed explosion, dealing damage and slowing nearby foes
